10-7.event: Birth of Imam Mohammad Taqi al‐Jawwad(a.s.) – the 9th Holy Imam ‐ (195 A.H.)

13-7.event: Birth of Imam Ali(a.s.) – the 1st Holy Imam ‐ (30 Aamul Feel)

15-7.event: Death of Hazrat Zainab bin‐e‐Ali(a.s.) – (62 A.H.)

20-7.event: Birth of Hazrat Sakina bint‐al‐Hussein(a.s.) – (57 A.H.)

24-7.event: Victory of Battle of Khaibar by Imam Ali (as) – (7 A.H.)

25-7.event: Martyrdom of Imam Musa‐e‐Kazim(a.s.) – the 7th Holy Imam ‐ (183 A.H.)

27-7.event: Event of Mi'raj – Ascension of Prophet Muhammad(sawaw) towards heavens

1-8.event: Birth of Hazrat Zainab bint‐e‐Ali(a.s.) ‐ (5 A.H.)

3-8.event: Birth of Imam Hussein(a.s.) ‐ the 3rd Holy Imam ‐ (4 A.H.)

11-8.event: Birth of Hazrat Ali Akbar(a.s.) ‐ (44 A.H.)

15-8.event: Birth of Wali e Asr Imam Mahdi (atfs) ‐ the 12th Holy Imam ‐ (255 A.H.)

10-9.event: Death of Hazrat Khadija(a.s.) ‐ wife of Prophet Mohammad (sawaw)

11-9.event: Moakhat ‐ Brotherhood among Ansar and Muhajireen ‐ (1 A.H.)

15-9.event: Birth of Imam Hasan(a.s.) ‐ the 2nd Holy Imam ‐ (2 A.H.)

18-9.event: Evening ‐ Probable night of Shab‐e‐Qadr ‐ the night of Power

19-9.event: Imam Ali(a.s.) injured by an attack by a munfiq ‐ (40 A.H.)

21-9.event: Martyrdom of Imam Ali(a.s.) ‐ the 1st Holy Imam ‐ (40 A.H.)

22-9.event: Evening ‐ Most probable night of Shab‐e‐Qadr ‐ the night of Power

27-9.event: Another probable night of Shab‐e‐Qadr ‐ the night of Power

8-10.event: Demolition of Jannatul Baqi by Aal e Saud.

8-12.event: Imam Hussein (a.s.) left Makkah towards Karbala

9-12.event: Martyrdom: Hazrat Muslim Ibne Aqeel (a.s.) / Yaum-e-Arafat

14-12.event: Bagh-e-Fadak gifted by Hazrat Rasul-e-Khuda S.A.W. to Bibi Hazrat Fatima S.A.

2-1.event: Arrival of Imam Hussein (a.s.) in Karbala

7-1.event: Access to water was blocked from the camp of Imam Hussein(a.s.) – the 3rd Holy Imam ‐ (61 A.H.)

10-1.event: Ashoora ‐ Martyrdom of Imam Hussein(a.s.) and his companions ‐ (61 A.H.)

11-1.event: Prophet Mohammad(sawaw)’s family was shackled and taken away as prisoners

16-1.event: Change of direction of qibla from Bait‐al‐maqdas to Kaaba ‐ (2 A.H.)

17-1.event: Attack of Abraha’s army on Khana‐e‐Kaaba (1 Aamul Feel)

25-1.event: Martyrdom of Imam Ali Zain‐al‐Abideen(a.s.) – the 4th Holy Imam ‐ (95 A.H.)

Shahadate Janabe Mohsin (a.s.)

14-3.event: Marg e Yazid (may Allah's curses be upon him) - 64 A.H.
